text: The Mercedes-Benz GLA is a small luxury SUV produced by luxury brand Mercedes- Benz since 2014. It is now in its second generation. It has a choice of front- wheel, or four-wheel drive. It has 2 rows and is on the MFA platform currently. The GLA's model codes are: • X156 (first generation) • H247 (second generation) Since the start, the GLA has been based on MFA platform. ==Other websites== * GLA Category:Sport utility vehicles Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles
title: Mercedes-Benz GLA
